record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1916. Fourth row: S. G. Veazey, A. A. Stagg (coach), and F. L. Brinkman: third row: N. B. Johnson, C. A. Brodie, H. B. Dismond, F. Firestone, and E. F. Traut; second row: G. W. Plume, D. R. Powers, D. J. Fisher, F. S. Whiting, C. T. Brelos, J. G. Guerin, and W. J. Mather; first row: R. M. Angier, C. M. Bent, D. M. Swett, F. E. Pershing, H. R. Clark, C. J. Stout (captain), R. O. Cornwall, P. E. Wagner, and D. H. Sparks.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
